abstract.text: Creates a waiter that waits on group of expectations for up to the specified timeout, optionally enforcing their order of fulfillment.

inlineContent.text: An array of expectations the test must satisfy.
The time, in seconds, the test allows for the fulfillment of the expectations.
, the test must satisfy the expectations in the order they appear in the array.
A value describing the outcome of waiting for
Use this Concurrency safe alternative to
in your Swift code. A call to
runs synchronously and blocks the calling thread, which can cause deadlocks or priority inversion.
Expectations can only appear in the array once. The call may return before the timeout if the test fulfills all the expectations you provide.
If you donâ€™t specify a timeout when calling this function, enable test timeouts to prevent unfulfilled expectation from hanging the test.
The test discards the waiter after the wait completes.

abstract.text: Create and run unit tests, performance tests, and UI tests for your Xcode project.

Result states returned by a waiter when it completes, times out, fails, or is interrupted.
